post.author: 최덕선

comment.author: 최덕선
comment.content: If you plan to attend, please let me know. We can go together. It includes free dinner.

post.content:
Dear T,
On behalf of Versant, I'm pleased to invite you to a dinner event hosted by Versant & IBM. The event starts with a technical seminar conducted by Versant's CTO, Keiron McCammon, who co-authored the "Core JDO" book. This will be followed by dinner and some fun at the Second City comedy club (see details below). As seating is limited, please register today at the following url. http://www.versant.com/secondcity/
If you cannot attend but are still interested in the JDO (JavaDataObjects) standard, please send me a note and I can arrange a informal telecon/webinar with one of our system engineers.
Sincerely,
Jim
James Thompson, P.Eng. Regional Director, Canada Versant www.versant.com 416.233.2346 Office jthompson@versant.com
"Evaluating Data Access & Persistence Alternatives for Java Applications"
Join IBM and Versant for education, dinner, and an evening of comedy.
post.title: JDO Dinner Event(free) at Second City Comedy Club - Wed, April 28
